entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WASM System.Text.Json memory leak with custom converter #43038
  • ApplicationBuilder.ServerFeatures nullable issue #43036
    7.0-rc1
  • Hot Reload Stopped Working Blazor WASM #43035
  • OAuthCreatingTicketContext still uses Newtonsoft JObject rather than JsonElement as replaced back in 2019? #43034
  • Perf regression: plaintext #43032
  • Perf improvement: json #43031
  • RFC 9266: Channel Bindings for TLS 1.3 support #43030
  • Authentication Failure Doesn't Display Failure Reason #43029
  • Perf regression: fortunes, plaintext #43017
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #43016
  • Binding issue with dynamic controls #43015

Closed

  • jquery-validation-unobstrusive in samples is licensed under a non-open source license #34785
    7.0-rc1
  • Update jquery-validation-unobtrusive dependency #42904
    7.0-rc1
  • When the logging fields is all, the request query is not logging #42807
    7.0-rc1
  • Additional files in blazor hybrid project throw error by default #41397
    7.0-rc1
  • Blazor WASM Template tests are too long #42406
    7.0-rc1
  • Perf regression: https #43010
  • [Component vulnerability - governance alert] For "@microsoft/signalr" JS package, please update "node-fetch" dependency from vulnerable 2.6.7 version #43019
  • Cleanup u8 string literal workarounds #41455
    7.0-rc1
  • API Calls Fail on mobile safari browser #43006
  • Derived class properties are not serialized #43018

PullRequests

Created

  • HTTP/3: Support QUIC idle timeout more cleanly #43037
    area-runtime
  • Update SDK #43028
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `74e05a1` to `0c5a96b` #43022
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `96f5142` to `dd7a9d2` #43021
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `96f5142` to `dd7a9d2` #43020
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.x

Merged

  • HTTP/3: ValueTask pooling #42760
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Try to capture more helix logs for IIS errors #42992
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Updated to jquery.validate.unobtrusive v4.0.0 #42999
    area-mvc, 7.0-rc1
  • Add comment about RequestQuery #42978
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Update Selenium ChromeDriver version #43027
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • Split Blazor WASM Auth Tests to New Project #42879
    area-mvc, 7.0-rc1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `7735334` to `dd7a9d2` #43024
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `7aa1fe7` to `d5773b7` #43023
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • Cleanup u8 workarounds #42995
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • Disallowing `nullable` with `AsParameters` attribute #42812
    area-web-frameworks
  • [dotnet user-jwts] Move signing key details to top-level property #42674
    area-web-frameworks, feature-userjwts
  • [release/6.0] Move builds to MacOS 11 #42792
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • JSON "null" request body rejected as an empty request body #41002
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Http Response fails when writing more than 255MB #41239
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove RequestDelegateFactory call from RouteEndpointBuilder #42827
    area-runtime
  • [Blazor] Dynamic authentication requests #42692
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm-auth
  • Add alt-used to known headers #43012
    area-runtime
